actions.name: Hubris

cost.trigger: The user causes another creature to gain @Affliction[fainted].

actions.description:
Trigger: The user causes another creature to gain @Affliction[fainted].

Effect: The user's SPATK Stage is raised by +1 for 5 Activations.
